text: Hasselager is a small suburban area in the south-western part of Aarhus in Denmark. It is about 8 km from the city center and has approximately 4,000 residents, mostly of Danish heritage. Hasselager has largely merged with neighbouring area Kolt in modern times, and the two are collectively know and referred to as Kolt-Hasselager, with shared postal code 8361. The area is predominantly residential and includes the Hasselhøj development, but also contains a large industrial park. == References == == Sources == *Ormslev Kolt Lokalhistoriske samling: Hasselager, archives on local history == External links == Category:Neighborhoods of Aarhus
title: Hasselager
